author: whitecapsO
description: Generic Farmware function to move between two grids each move completed within 20 minutes

1.name: xAxisCount
1.label: Number of x axis positions in each grid (0-20):

2.name: yAxisCount
2.label: Number of y axis positions in each grid (0-20):

3.name: spaceBetweenXGrid1
3.label: The number of millimeters between each x axis position in first grid:

4.name: spaceBetweenYGrid1
4.label: The number of millimeters between each y axis in position first grid:

5.name: startXGrid1
5.label: Where to start the x axis from in first grid:

6.name: startYGrid1
6.label: Where to start the y axis from in first grid:

7.name: startOfXSlopeGrid1
7.label: Start of X axis slope in first grid:

8.name: sineOfAngleXGrid1
8.label: Sine of angle of the X axis slope in first grid:

9.name: alternateInBetweenGrid1
9.label: Whether to calculate alternate in between X axis positions in first grid:

10.name: sequenceAfter1stGridMove
10.label: Sequence to call after moving to a cell on the first grid:

11.name: spaceBetweenXGrid2
11.label: The number of millimeters between each x axis position in second grid:

12.name: spaceBetweenYGrid2
12.label: The number of millimeters between each y axis in position in second grid:

13.name: startXGrid2
13.label: Where to start the x axis from in second grid:

14.name: startYGrid2
14.label: Where to start the y axis from in second grid:

15.name: startOfXSlopeGrid2
15.label: Start of X axis slope in second grid:

16.name: sineOfAngleXGrid2
16.label: Sine of angle of the X axis slope in second grid:

17.name: alternateInBetweenGrid2
17.label: Whether to calculate alternate in between X axis positions in second grid:

18.name: sequenceAfter2ndGridMove
18.label: Sequence to call after moving to a cell on the second grid:

19.name: movesWithin20Mins
19.label: How many moves within the next 20 minutes
